query: SELECT ic.*, i.name as ingredientName FROM ingredientConversions ic JOIN ingredients i ON ic.ingredientId = i.id WHERE ic.restaurantId = 1 ORDER BY i.name;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 49cxSE1jUeHq7LY.root --database KMmUaMc2BgFeVkUfVYZGPD --execute SELECT ic.*, i.name as ingredientName FROM ingredientConversions ic JOIN ingredients i ON ic.ingredientId = i.id WHERE ic.restaurantId = 1 ORDER BY i.name;
